id.description: Uniquely identifies the conference by id

$ul: **connection_id**: Identifies the connection (Call Control App) associated with the conference
**created_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date of when the conference was created
**ended_by**: IDs related to who ended the conference. It is expected for them to all be there or all be null
**call_control_id**: Call Control ID which ended the conference
**call_session_id**: Call Session ID which ended the conference
**expires_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date of when the conference will expire
**region**: Region where the conference is hosted
**updated_at**: ISO 8601 formatted date of when the conference was last updated
